question: Which country to host the 12th edition of G20 summit?
explanation: The 12th edition of G20 summit will be held on July 7â€“8, 2017 in Hamburg, Germany. The G20 is an international forum for the governments and central bank governors from 20 major economies with the aim of studying, reviewing and promoting high-level discussion of policy issues pertaining to the promotion of international financial stability.
